remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由远程处理基础结构用于在服务器端上生成 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)。The class is used by the remoting infrastructure to generate Web Services Description Language (WSDL) on the server side. 类提供的功能的[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5)命令行工具，然后可以以编程方式使用，来实现相同的结果。The class provides the functionality of the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) command-line tool, and can be used programmatically to achieve the same outcome. 方法可以用于类，创建 XML 架构，用于描述在源代码中，公开的服务，以及用于从 XML 架构创建 C# 代码。The methods of the class can be used to create XML schemas that describe services that are exposed in source code, and to create C# code from XML schema.
